pr_title: feat: Extend CAST to ARRAY, MAP and STRUCT

timeline.message:
fix: extend CAST to structured types

fixes: https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql/issues/6584

Extend CAST to the structured types `ARRAY`, `MAP` and `STRUCT`.

refactor: refactor cast evaluator

Clean up the code.
fix: fix null handling and extend to array, map, struct
Merge branch 'cast' of github.com:big-andy-coates/ksql into cast

timeline.bodyText: Should it be good to have a unit test for this?
timeline.author: spena

+/**
+ * Functions to help with generating code to work around the fact that the script engine doesn't
+ * support lambdas.
+ */
+public final class LambdaUtil {
+
+  private LambdaUtil() {
+  }
+

+   * @param lambdaBody the body of the lambda. It will find the n
+   * @return code to instantiate the function.
+   */

timeline.bodyText: Unit tests? Seems useful to know what the returned code is.
